## Question 4: Load the Stroop dataset from GitHub

#run only once to download the data

```{r}
stroop_data <- read.delim( "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Lakens/Stroop/master/stroop.txt", header = TRUE, stringsAsFactors = FALSE )
write.csv( stroop_data, file = "stroop.csv", row.names = FALSE )
```

```{r}
stroop_data <- read.csv("stroop.csv",header = TRUE)
```
